None.Name: Infused Desert Sand
None.Description: Creates a gritty tornado that moves along a defined path of at least 15m length, hurling several boulders, each dealing 90 damage to enemies in a 10m radius, up to 270 in total per second. It devestates the area in such a way as to make it impossible to play out cards in it for 15 seconds. May cover a maximum distance of 30m. Reusable every 30 seconds.
